Articles.Content:
@PART[ISRU]:FINAL
{
	!MODULE[ModuleResourceConverter]
	{
	}

	MODULE
	{
		 name = ModuleResourceConverter
		 ConverterName = #autoLOC_502026 //#autoLOC_502026 = Lf+Ox
		 StartActionName = #autoLOC_502027 //#autoLOC_502027 = Start ISRU [Lf+Ox]
		 StopActionName = #autoLOC_502028 //#autoLOC_502028 = Stop ISRU [Lf+Ox]
		AutoShutdown = true
		TemperatureModifier
		{
			key = 0 100000
			key = 750 50000
			key = 1000 10000
			key = 1250 500	
			key = 2000 50	
			key = 4000 0
		}				
		GeneratesHeat = true
		DefaultShutoffTemp = .8
		ThermalEfficiency 
		{
			key = 0 0 0 0
			key = 500 0.1 0 0
			key = 1000 1.0 0 0
			key = 1250 0.1 0 0
			key = 3000 0 0 0 
		}


		UseSpecialistBonus = true
		SpecialistEfficiencyFactor = 0.2
		SpecialistBonusBase = 0.05
		UseSpecialistHeatBonus = true
		SpecialistHeatFactor = 0.1
		ExperienceEffect = ConverterSkill
		EfficiencyBonus = 1

		 
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = Ore
			Ratio = 5
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
  		 }
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = ElectricCharge
			Ratio = 30
		 }
		 OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = LiquidFuel
			Ratio = 4.5
			DumpExcess = false
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
		 }
		 OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = Oxidizer
			Ratio = 5.5
			DumpExcess = false
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
		 }
	}

	MODULE
	{
		 name = ModuleResourceConverter
		 ConverterName = #autoLOC_502029 //#autoLOC_502029 = Monoprop
		 StartActionName = #autoLOC_502030 //#autoLOC_502030 = Start ISRU [Monoprop]
		 StopActionName = #autoLOC_502031 //#autoLOC_502031 = Stop ISRU [Monoprop]
		AutoShutdown = true
		TemperatureModifier
		{
			key = 0 100000
			key = 750 50000
			key = 1000 10000
			key = 1250 500	
			key = 2000 50	
			key = 4000 0
		}				
		GeneratesHeat = true
		DefaultShutoffTemp = .8
		ThermalEfficiency 
		{
			key = 0 0 0 0
			key = 500 0.1 0 0
			key = 1000 1.0 0 0
			key = 1250 0.1 0 0
			key = 3000 0 0 0 
		}

		UseSpecialistBonus = true
		SpecialistEfficiencyFactor = 0.2
		SpecialistBonusBase = 0.05
		UseSpecialistHeatBonus = true
		SpecialistHeatFactor = 0.1
		ExperienceEffect = ConverterSkill
		EfficiencyBonus = 1

		 
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = Ore
			Ratio = 5
		 }
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = ElectricCharge
			Ratio = 30
		 }
		 OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = MonoPropellant
			Ratio = 10
			DumpExcess = false
		 }
	}


	MODULE
	{
		 name = ModuleResourceConverter
		 ConverterName = #autoLOC_502032 //#autoLOC_502032 = LiquidFuel
		 StartActionName = #autoLOC_502033 //#autoLOC_502033 = Start ISRU [LqdFuel]
		 StopActionName = #autoLOC_502034 //#autoLOC_502034 = Stop ISRU [LqdFuel]
		AutoShutdown = true
		TemperatureModifier
		{
			key = 0 100000
			key = 750 50000
			key = 1000 10000
			key = 1250 500	
			key = 2000 50	
			key = 4000 0
		}				
		GeneratesHeat = true
		DefaultShutoffTemp = .8
		ThermalEfficiency 
		{
			key = 0 0 0 0
			key = 500 0.1 0 0
			key = 1000 1.0 0 0
			key = 1250 0.1 0 0
			key = 3000 0 0 0 
		}
		
		UseSpecialistBonus = true
		SpecialistEfficiencyFactor = 0.2
		SpecialistBonusBase = 0.05
		UseSpecialistHeatBonus = true
		SpecialistHeatFactor = 0.1
		ExperienceEffect = ConverterSkill
		EfficiencyBonus = 1

		 
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = Ore
			Ratio = 4.5
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
  		 }
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = ElectricCharge
			Ratio = 30
		 }
		 OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = LiquidFuel
			Ratio = 9
			DumpExcess = false
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
		 }
	}

	
	MODULE
	{
		 name = ModuleResourceConverter
		 ConverterName = #autoLOC_502035 //#autoLOC_502035 = Oxidizer
		 StartActionName = #autoLOC_502036 //#autoLOC_502036 = Start ISRU [Ox]
		 StopActionName = #autoLOC_502037 //#autoLOC_502037 = Stop ISRU [Ox]
		AutoShutdown = true
		TemperatureModifier
		{
			key = 0 100000 0 0
			key = 750 50000 0 0
			key = 1000 10000 0 0
			key = 1250 500 0 0	 
			key = 2000 50 0 0	
			key = 4000 0 0 0
		}				
		GeneratesHeat = true
		DefaultShutoffTemp = .8
		ThermalEfficiency 
		{
			key = 0 0 0 0
			key = 500 0.1 0 0
			key = 1000 1.0 0 0
			key = 1250 0.1 0 0
			key = 3000 0 0 0 
		}

		UseSpecialistBonus = true
		SpecialistEfficiencyFactor = 0.2
		SpecialistBonusBase = 0.05
		UseSpecialistHeatBonus = true
		SpecialistHeatFactor = 0.1
		ExperienceEffect = ConverterSkill

		EfficiencyBonus = 1

		 
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = Ore
			Ratio = 5.5
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
  		 }
		 INPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = ElectricCharge
			Ratio = 30
		 }
		 OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		 {
			ResourceName = Oxidizer
			Ratio = 11
			DumpExcess = false
			FlowMode = STAGE_PRIORITY_FLOW
		 }
	}
}

I'm trying to create a Module Manager patch that increases drill harvest speed and ISRU speed by x10. I'm currently trying to do this by removing the ModuleResourceConverter modules and creating my own versions with the new values. However, this line:

!MODULE[ModuleResourceConverter]
    {
    }

only seems to delete the first ModuleResourceConverter module, and leaves the others, so I get duplicate nodes with different values. I'm sure it's just a syntax thing, but how do I make this line affect all ModuleResourceConverter nodes? Probably something with wildcards* or HAS blocks, but the instructions in the Module Manager github wiki aren't very clear to me on how to use these. Halp, plz.

Edit: I got it to work by adding extra lines of !MODULE[ModuleResourceConverter]{} for each stock node, but this feels really kludgy.

Alternatively, I know you can use @MODULE to modify nodes, rather than replace them, but I still run into the problem of differentiating between different modules with the same ModuleResourceConverter name, specifically in regards to how to refer to OUTPUT_RESOURCEs of different types so I can change the Ratio, etc.

Edited October 12, 2018 by DarkDrai

I think this should work : 

!MODULE[ModuleResourceConverter],* {}
This works perfectly! I had tried something similar, but I wasn't sure where to put the *wildcard. Thank you so much for this simple thing.
